description: Use apache/iceberg-rest-fixture as Iceberg Rest Catalog.
on_init: CREATE SECRET (TYPE S3,KEY_ID 'admin',SECRET 'password',ENDPOINT '127.0.0.1:9000',URL_STYLE 'path',USE_SSL 0); ATTACH '' AS my_datalake (TYPE ICEBERG,CLIENT_ID 'admin',CLIENT_SECRET 'password',ENDPOINT 'http://127.0.0.1:8181');
